content:
A happy new year to everyone! Is there any chance multiline expressions could be allowed in invariants?
I.e.,
expression: KW_EXPRESSION (STRING | MULTILINE_STRING);
instead of
expression: KW_EXPRESSION STRING;

Ok, expressions consisting from multiple lines are actually supported, I was just confused by the error message
Sushi: error mismatched input '"(' expecting STRING
which I got due to a syntax error in the expression.
Dmytro Rud has marked this topic as resolved.
